Overall, the sweater is comfortable and soft. Keeps me very warm and looks cool. Wish it was purple.

评论概述: Great fit, great graphics, great weight

Hopefully they hold up to long use and if so, definitely worth the price.

I think it's a company wide trend too, because I ordered a long sleeve shirt from them and the cuffs were fitted and made it tough to roll your sleeves up. I get that they have artwork on the sleeves, and it's pretty cool artwork, but I should also have the choice to roll them up if I need to get some stuff done.  I still gave them 3 stars because as far as asian streetwear goes, their designs are among the coolest.

评论概述: You pay for the amazing craftsmanship.
评论详情: I'm not someone who pays a pretty penny on a single thing at once, but I took a chance on this because I thought the designs were super sick. It was SO worth it, because the second I opened my package and tried it on I could just feel how nice the materials were and how beautiful the graphics looked. I wear a Medium, but I got a Large for a little extra room and so my boyfriend could wear it too, and it was fit exactly as I expected it would. 100% worth every cent. I never leave reviews either. This one is deserving.

I've just received a christmas gift of a bunch of their products and each one is soft, good prints and perfect sizing for my frame. As a lady who wanted these, medium and small differ from. Piece to piece. The zip hoodie run a bit small in the waist as a medium, where as medium in a hoodie is perfectly roomy.  Beanie isn't super tight and perfect for someone like me who gets migraines easily from head wear, and the sweater is super cuddly on the inside.  Two white hoods came with marks however, one an odd yellow mark on the shoulder and the other metal had oxidized and stained thr fabric. Currently waiting to hear back on either how to clean them or if I'm stuck with a replacement. Not handy as these are going off to the UK.  Everything came sealed individually and quality wise they're awesome. Many happy years of wearing these to come.  The shoes are comfy too.
This thing slaps
Quality and size, fits perfectly. By far, my favorite hoodie.

I absolutely love this piece as the design is cool and it is super comfy! I haven’t had it long enough to say about the durability, but the fabric is thick enough to keep you warm. Really love the fit of this piece as it is tight around the sleeves but a little baggy around the waist, as I like my hoodies to be! I ordered mine a size up to go for that oversized hoodie look.

评论概述: excellent craftsmanship and quality of material.
评论详情: the sizing is perfect . the vinyl lettering is high quality , i dont have to worry about cracking or peeling. the only suggestion i have is turn it inside out for an initial cleaning as you will get fuzz from the inside of the hoodie on your clothes or hair or whiskers. i am impressed and cant wait to order again.

I really like FU's products. They are all soft, warm, fabrics are as-advertised, brilliant colours, and functional. I bought this one in blue and was surprised (pleasantly) that the logos and designs on the back and arms aren't black or gray, but white. Pockets don't allow your keys, phone, or wallet an easy escape. It's getting cold here, and the hoodie is warm enough for a quick 10-minute walk to the gym in the morning, and it's long enough to cover my backside in my workout clothes once in at the gym. I'm pleased with my purchase. The same item is cheaper on FU's website, but shipping is far more expensive.
